message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic about the time value of money. This offer won't last.
I'll give you a bit more, but don't wait too long!
Time is money Alice, literally!  This is a fair deal considering.
You're running out of time, Bob!
Okay Alice, let's stop this back and forth. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome. Take it or leave it.
You should have taken my previous offer, now it's going to cost you!
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm willing to be slightly generous if you are to get this done.
You're really running out of time, Bob. Take this offer before it's too late!
